activities: We develop and sell legal software used in corporations, law firms and service bureaus. In order to effectively support that software for our customers they occasionally may need to send us copies of their data that may or may not include personal information.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any personal data received from a customer that resides in an EU country in relation to a software support incident.
recoursemech: Ipro has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
